XenotypeDef.label: lizardfolk
XenotypeDef.description: An ancient genetically modified race of people intended for unskilled labor in the subequatorial belt, mainly in conditions of toxic and biohazard danger, get along well in the swamps thanks to their strong immunity. Not too smart, but strong in health creatures that do not tolerate the cold.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Heavily modified swamp dwellers, created for work in biohazardous environments way back.

XenotypeDef.label: desert reptiles
XenotypeDef.description: It is unknown who and when started deliberately spreading these anthropomorphic lizards on different planets, but one thing is obvious - they are ideal for life at extreme temperatures in which a person would not survive. Those days are long gone, and the owners abandoned them. Now these cunning, tenacious and aggressive creatures inhabit a significant number of worlds, making predatory raids on those who have at least something that can be taken by force, and hiding from revenge in sandstorms.
